text: Does anyone else run into issues when using the watch command, that it uploads empty files? It usually works for the first change I make in my files, but then any subsequent changes in my files get uploaded as empty files. I am resorting to having to use the upload command for every file change I make
Thanks Frank! <@U7W5SDG3D> it there any way I can start to use the beta?

Hey <@UATE4ATHP> In the github repo the new unreleased version is available. Abit undocumented, but feel free to DM me if you have questions. <https://github.com/iGoMoon/HubSpot-tools/tree/FieldsJs/Major>

We’re looking to release a new version of fields after the summer.
